data.name: PythonScriptExecutionFailed
data.value:
Python executable executable {0} failed.
If you're using Windows 7/8 you could try installing the Windows Universal C Runtime https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48234 then try again.
Or you could try: - Installing Python - Add Python it to your path - Delete the {1} executable which will force Firebase to use the Python interpreter - Restart Unity
